exception.name: Swift Exception
exception.notes: This exception was created specifically to be used with Apache-2.0

titleText.p: Runtime Library Exception to the Apache 2.0 License:

text.p: As an exception, if you use this Software to compile your source code and portions of this Software are embedded into the binary product as a result, you may redistribute such product without providing attribution as would otherwise be required by Sections 4(a), 4(b) and 4(d) of the License.
